participant_1.background:
I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta.
I hope I can find a way to combine my two loves: paddle boarding and makeup.
I think it's cool that I'm able to serve my country and protect my family.
I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.

participant_2.background:

I enjoy wearing suits that make a statement.
we are getting married in a park.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
I'm curious about the relationship between humans and animals, and how we can better understand each other.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going so far?
Hi! It's going pretty well, thanks for asking! I just got back from a run. How about you?
I'm doing well! I just got back from a meeting. I'm a software engineer.
That's cool! I'm a wedding photographer.
Oh, that must be fun! I've always enjoyed taking pictures.
It is fun! I love getting to document people's special moments.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I do. What's your favorite thing about your job?
I like the problem-solving aspect of it. I also like working with a team of people.
That sounds like a good job. I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks! I am. What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love getting to meet new people and document their special moments.
That sounds like a really rewarding job.
It is! I love getting to see people so happy.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
